title: OPEN SOURCE WEB FONT SIMILAR TO APEX
content:
I'm looking for a google web font similar to Apex – anyone know of anything close?

Thanks!  
Daniel
author: dhennessy

comments.content:
All of the following are stylistically close:

Lato  
Duru Sans  
Varela  
Varela Round  
Shanti  
Antic  
Actor  
Asap  
Carme

I don't agree in any of the suggested fonts – sorry, kthomps5 ;)

I am personally using Titillium Web as substitute for Apex. To me that seems much more suited.

[http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Titillium+Web](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154901/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Titillium+Web "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Titillium+Web")
